charges.charge_description: 42:9603 &; 18:2 FALSE CLAIMS &; STATEMENTS and Aid and Abet (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The deft shall pay a special assessment of $50.00. The deft shall pay the fine imposed by this judgment in monthly installments as determined by the Probation Officer. The deft shall perform 100 hours of community service as directed by the Probation Officer. The fine and special assessment provided for in this judgment shall be paid through the Clerk. The deft shall pay a fine of $1,500. and Statement of Reasons attached. (1)
